messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 434
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/27/2000 10:51:34 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com writes: I know of a site where folks post rebate info, special deals my sister has
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/27/2000 10:51:34 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
writes:

<<>I know of a site where folks post rebate info, special deals


my sister has a great site at www.clevermoms.com - lots of coupon codes

(6 or 7 of them are book stores!) separated by category - children,

software, toys, pets and so on - plus she will be opening a resale side

of the site very soon where you can buy/sell gently used items - she has

a homeschool/unschool section there -

I enjoy it - think you all might, too>>

Don't I remember a news story about a frugality expert (who may have been a
homeschooling mom?) who was prosectuted for coupon redemption fraud?

It's a good idea to make sure what you are suggesting is legal.

Thanks,
Betsy
